definition: a basket usually with a cover, prevent the progress or free movement of
details:
noun
- a basket usually with a cover
- a restraint that confines or restricts freedom (especially something used to tie down or restrain a prisoner)
= synonyms: bond
verb
- prevent the progress or free movement of
= example: prevent the progress or free movement of
= synonyms: halter
- put at a disadvantage
= synonyms: disadvantage, handicap, disfavor, disfavour, hinder
